thread.title: Amlan International Appoints Marty Thompson as Southwest U.S. Key Accounts Manager | ODC Stock News
thread.title_full: Amlan International Appoints Marty Thompson as Southwest U.S. Key Accounts Manager | ODC Stock News

author: Oil-Dri Corporation of America
title: Amlan International Appoints Marty Thompson as Southwest U.S. Key Accounts Manager | ODC Stock News
text:
Amlan International Appoints Marty Thompson as Southwest U.S. Key Accounts Manager
Amlan International, a leading innovator in mineral-based feed additives for poultry and animal production, has appointed Marty Thompson as Southwest Key Accounts Manager for the U.S. Thompson brings extensive experience in the livestock and feed industry, with a proven track record of success in business development and sales growth.
In his previous role as National Account Manager, Thompson successfully grew sales of vitamins and feed additives to major poultry integrators and livestock feed manufacturers. At Amlan, he will focus on strengthening customer relationships, driving sales initiatives, and supporting the company's commitment to advancing animal health with their mineral technology.
Thompson holds a B.S. in Animal Science from Oklahoma State University and has completed graduate studies at the University of Arkansas. His appointment aligns with Amlan's strategic objectives in the Southwest region and is expected to contribute to the company's continued growth and success.
Amlan International, un innovatore leader negli additivi per mangimi a base minerale per la produzione avicola e animale, ha nominato Marty Thompson come Account Manager per le Grandi Aziende del Sud-ovest degli Stati Uniti. Thompson porta un'ampia esperienza nel settore dell'allevamento e dei mangimi, con un comprovato successo nello sviluppo commerciale e nella crescita delle vendite.
Nel suo precedente ruolo come National Account Manager, Thompson ha aumentato con successo le vendite di vitamine e additivi per mangimi ai principali integratori avicoli e produttori di mangimi per animali. In Amlan, si concentrerà su rafforzare le relazioni con i clienti, guidare le iniziative di vendita e supportare l'impegno dell'azienda per il miglioramento della salute animale attraverso la loro tecnologia minerale.
Thompson ha conseguito una laurea in Scienze Animali presso l'Oklahoma State University ed ha completato studi post-laurea presso l'Università dell'Arkansas. La sua nomina è in linea con gli obiettivi strategici di Amlan nella regione del Sud-ovest e si prevede che contribuisca alla continua crescita e successo dell’azienda.
Amlan International, un innovador líder en aditivos para piensos a base de minerales para la producción avícola y animal, ha designado a Marty Thompson como Gerente de Cuentas Clave del Suroeste para EE. UU. Thompson aporta una amplia experiencia en la industria del ganado y de piensos, con un historial comprobado de éxito en el desarrollo de negocios y en el crecimiento de ventas.
En su rol anterior como Gerente de Cuentas Nacionales, Thompson aumentó con éxito las ventas de vitaminas y aditivos para piensos a importantes integradores avícolas y fabricantes de piensos para ganado. En Amlan, se concentrará en fortalecer las relaciones con los clientes, impulsar iniciativas de ventas y apoyar el compromiso de la empresa de avanzar en la salud animal con su tecnología mineral.
Thompson tiene una licenciatura en Ciencias Animales de la Universidad Estatal de Oklahoma y ha completado estudios de posgrado en la Universidad de Arkansas. Su nombramiento se alinea con los objetivos estratégicos de Amlan en la región del Suroeste y se espera que contribuya al crecimiento y éxito continuos de la empresa.
Amlan International은 가축 및 동물 생산을 위한 미네랄 기반 사료 첨가제의 선도적인 혁신 기업으로, 미국 남서부 주요 고객 관리자로 마티 톰슨을 임명했습니다. 톰슨은 축산 및 사료 산업에서 폭넓은 경험을 가지고 있으며, 비즈니스 개발 및 매출 성장에서 검증된 성공 기록을 보유하고 있습니다.
이전의 국가 계정 관리자로서 톰슨은 주요 가금류 통합업체와 가축 사료 제조업체에 비타민 및 사료 첨가제 판매를 성공적으로 증가시켰습니다. Amlan에서 그는 고객 관계 강화, 판매 이니셔티브 추진 및 미네랄 기술로 동물 건강 향상을 위한 회사의 헌신 지원에 집중할 것입니다.
톰슨은 오클라호마 주립대학교에서 동물학 학사 학위를 취득하였으며, 아칸소 대학교에서 대학원 과정을 이수했습니다. 그의 임명은 Amlan의 남서부 지역 전략 목표에 부합하며, 회사의 지속적인 성장과 성공에 기여할 것으로 기대됩니다.
Amlan International, un innovateur de premier plan dans les additifs alimentaires à base de minéraux pour la production avicole et animale, a nommé Marty Thompson au poste de Responsable des Comptes Clés du Sud-Ouest pour les États-Unis. Thompson apporte une vaste expérience dans l'industrie de l'élevage et des aliments, avec un parcours éprouvé de réussite en développement commercial et croissance des ventes.
Dans son précédent poste de Responsable des Comptes Nationaux, Thompson a réussi à augmenter les ventes de vitamines et d'additifs alimentaires auprès de principaux intégrateurs avicoles et fabricants d'aliments pour animaux. Chez Amlan, il se concentrera sur le renforcement des relations clients, l'initiative de vente et le soutien à l'engagement de l'entreprise en faveur de l'amélioration de la santé animale grâce à leur technologie minérale.
Thompson détient une licence en sciences animales de l'Oklahoma State University et a complété des études de troisième cycle à l'Université de l'Arkansas. Sa nomination s'inscrit dans les objectifs stratégiques d'Amlan dans la région du Sud-Ouest et devrait contribuer à la croissance et au succès continu de l'entreprise.
Amlan International, ein führender Innovator im Bereich mineralbasierter Futtermittelzusätze für die Geflügel- und Tierproduktion, hat Marty Thompson zum Key Account Manager für den Südwesten der USA ernannt. Thompson bringt umfangreiche Erfahrung in der Tierhaltung und Futtermittelindustrie mit und kann auf eine nachweisliche Erfolgsgeschichte im Bereich Geschäftsentwicklung und Umsatzwachstum zurückblicken.
In seiner vorherigen Rolle als National Account Manager konnte Thompson die Verkäufe von Vitaminen und Futtermittelzusätzen an große Geflügelintegratoren und Futtermittelhersteller erfolgreich steigern. Bei Amlan wird er sich darauf konzentrieren, die Kundenbeziehungen zu stärken, Verkaufsinitiativen voranzutreiben und das Engagement des Unternehmens für die Verbesserung der Tiergesundheit durch deren Mineraltechnologie zu unterstützen.
Thompson hat einen B.Sc. in Tierwissenschaften von der Oklahoma State University und hat das Graduiertenstudium an der University of Arkansas abgeschlossen. Seine Ernennung steht im Einklang mit den strategischen Zielen von Amlan in der Südwestregion und wird voraussichtlich zum fortlaufenden Wachstum und Erfolg des Unternehmens beitragen.
- Appointment of experienced industry professional as Southwest Key Accounts Manager
- Potential for sales growth and expanded market presence in the Southwest region
- Strengthening of customer relationships and sales initiatives
- None.
CHICAGO, Sept. 19, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Amlan International, a leading innovator in mineral-based feed additives for poultry and animal production, is pleased to announce the appointment of Marty Thompson as Southwest Key Accounts Manager for the U.S. Marty joins Amlan with extensive experience in the livestock and feed industry, bringing a proven track record of success and a passion for fostering valuable partnerships.
“We are thrilled to welcome Marty Thompson to the Amlan team,” said Heath Wessels, Vice President of Sales, The Americas. “His background, initiative, and sales growth achievements will be tremendous assets as we continue to expand our presence and enhance partnerships in the Southwest region.”
Marty joins Amlan with an impressive track record of business development within the livestock feed industry. As a National Account Manager, he successfully grew sales of vitamins and an array of feed additives to major poultry integrators and livestock feed manufacturers at his previous organization.
In his new role at Amlan, Marty will be instrumental in strengthening customer relationships, driving sales initiatives, and supporting Amlan’s commitment to advancing animal health with our mineral technology. With a 23-year history in the industry, Marty is well-equipped to enhance Amlan’s strategic objectives in the Southwest region. Marty holds a B.S. in Animal Science from Oklahoma State University and has completed graduate studies at the University of Arkansas.
President of Amlan International, Dr. Wade Robey, added, “Marty’s expertise makes him an ideal fit for the position. His ability to deliver exceptional results and his commitment to building trust by proving a product’s value align perfectly with Amlan’s ethics and goals. We are confident that Marty will help advance our growth initiatives and contribute to the continued success of the region.”
Amlan International is headquartered in Chicago, with its R&D center, the 6,000-square-foot Nick Jaffee Center for Innovation, located in Vernon Hills, Illinois. In 2019, the company strengthened its research capabilities with the expansion of its Richard M. Jaffee Center for Applied Microbiology to accelerate novel animal health and life sciences research.
About Amlan International
Amlan International is the animal health business of Oil-Dri Corporation of America, a leading global manufacturer and marketer of sorbent minerals. Oil-Dri leverages over 80 years of expertise in mineral science to selectively mine and process its unique mineral for consumer and business-to-business markets. Oil-Dri Corporation of America doing business as “Amlan International” is a publicly traded stock on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: ODC). Amlan International sells feed additives across the world. Product availability may vary by country; associated claims do not constitute medical claims and may differ based on government requirements. For more information on Amlan International, please visit
www.amlan.com.
Contact: Reagan Culbertson, Vice President of Strategic Marketing, B2B Email:
Reagan.culbertson@amlan.com
